name: CPU TAKEOVER
description:
BUGFIX: There was a game-breaking bug before were dying left you stuck in the level. It has been fixed

Controls:

Mouse and Keyboard: Use WASD to move and the mouse to aim, shoot with LMB and dash with RMB.

Controller (recommended): Use the left stick to move and the right one to aim and shoot. You can dash using L1 and R1

We are part of our college game development group, Game Dev Técnico, which can be found here on Itch.io, and on Facebook and Twitter!
